short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to share data about your social feed with researchers and journalists to increase transparency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to capture users' Facebook ads and shares with academic researchers to understand the online advertising ecosystem.
